engChrName: Vegas Films Headquarters: B5F
engSearchText: Vegas Films Headquarters: B5F
jpnChrName: ベガスフィルム本社　地下５Ｆ
jpnSearchText: ベガスフィルム本社　地下５Ｆ

engChrName: O-Oh, right. I should activate the security system just in case.
engSearchText:
O-Oh, right. I should activate the security system just
in case.
jpnChrName: そ、そうだ…… 念のため起動しておくか……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうだ……
念のため起動しておくか……

engChrName: Security system activated.
engSearchText: Security system activated.
jpnChrName: 警備モードをオンにしました。
jpnSearchText: <C1>警備モードをオンにしました。

engChrName: I-I need to get rid of that evidence, whatever it takes!
engSearchText: I-I need to get rid of that evidence, whatever it takes!
jpnChrName: と、とにかくアレだけは なんとか処分しなければ……！
jpnSearchText:
と、とにかくアレだけは
なんとか処分しなければ……！

engChrName: He's finally on the move.
engSearchText: He's finally on the move.
jpnChrName: ……やっと行ったか。
jpnSearchText: <C1>……やっと行ったか。

engChrName: I didn't know it was possible to do this with shards.
engSearchText: I didn't know it was possible to do this with shards.
jpnChrName: こんな使い方もあるなんて……
jpnSearchText: こんな使い方もあるなんて……

engChrName: They're the same camouflage ones Van used to catch me when we first met!
engSearchText:
They're the same camouflage ones Van used to catch
me when we first met!
jpnChrName: 以前わたしが引っかかった 偽装シャードの応用ですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
以前わたしが引っかかった
偽装シャードの応用ですねっ。

engChrName: That voice modification just now was pretty awesome, too.
engSearchText:
That voice modification just now was pretty
awesome, too.
jpnChrName: クク、さっきの“変声機能”も なかなか面白かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、さっきの“変声機能”も
なかなか面白かったぜ。

engChrName: Shards can do that, too, huh?
engSearchText: Shards can do that, too, huh?
jpnChrName: あれもシャードを使ってんのか？
jpnSearchText: あれもシャードを使ってんのか？

engChrName: They can indeed. Shards can be used in a great many ways by combining them with a holo.
engSearchText:
They can indeed. Shards can be used in a great many
ways by combining them with a holo.
jpnChrName: はい、ホロウと組み合わせる事で 各種シャードは様々に応用できます。
jpnSearchText:
はい、ホロウと組み合わせる事で
各種シャードは様々に応用できます。

engChrName: I would be happy to educate you all on the specifics some other time, if you have an interest.
engSearchText:
I would be happy to educate you all on the specifics
some other time, if you have an interest.
jpnChrName: 機会があればご指南いたしますので なんでも聞いてくださいませ。
jpnSearchText:
機会があればご指南いたしますので
なんでも聞いてくださいませ。

engChrName: I-If you'd like... (Though this feels a little illegal, almost...)
engSearchText:
I-If you'd like...
(Though this feels a little illegal, almost...)
jpnChrName: よ、よろしくお願いします。 （違法ギリギリな気もしますが……）
jpnSearchText:
よ、よろしくお願いします。
（違法ギリギリな気もしますが……）

engChrName: Anyway, I can't believe this building has such a massive basement.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I can't believe this building has such a
massive basement.
jpnChrName: ──それにしても“地下”に こんな大きなフロアがあったなんて。
jpnSearchText:
──それにしても“地下”に
こんな大きなフロアがあったなんて。

engChrName: Yeah. Turns out Dingo and the CID's intel was right on the money.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Turns out Dingo and the CID's intel was right
on the money.
jpnChrName: あるはずのねぇ“Ｂ５Ｆ”…… ディンゴとＣＩＤの情報通りだったな。
jpnSearchText:
あるはずのねぇ“Ｂ５Ｆ”……
ディンゴとＣＩＤの情報通りだったな。

engChrName: Looks like some kinda research facility...but what I wanna know is, what're YOU doing here?
engSearchText:
Looks like some kinda research facility...but what I
wanna know is, what're YOU doing here?
jpnChrName: 何かの研究施設みたいだが…… ──で、お前さんはどうするんだ？
jpnSearchText:
何かの研究施設みたいだが……
──で、お前さんはどうするんだ？

engChrName: Thought you'd notice me sooner than later.
engSearchText: Thought you'd notice me sooner than later.
jpnChrName: やっぱ気づかれてたか。
jpnSearchText: やっぱ気づかれてたか。

engChrName: Whoa, hey!
engSearchText: Whoa, hey!
jpnChrName: ……あなたは……！
jpnSearchText: ……あなたは……！

engChrName: How long have you been up there?!
engSearchText: How long have you been up there?!
jpnChrName: チッ、いつの間に……
jpnSearchText: チッ、いつの間に……

engChrName: Y-You didn't sneak in before us, did you?
engSearchText: Y-You didn't sneak in before us, did you?
jpnChrName: も、もしかして先回りを？
jpnSearchText: も、もしかして先回りを？

engChrName: Mm-hmm. All the info we got from that reporter and the CID led me here.
engSearchText:
Mm-hmm. All the info we got from that reporter and
the CID led me here.
jpnChrName: ま、ＣＩＤと記者さんの情報から 何かやらかしそうな雰囲気だったから。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ＣＩＤと記者さんの情報から
何かやらかしそうな雰囲気だったから。

engChrName: Too bad I wasn't able to fool your boss or the concierge there.
engSearchText:
Too bad I wasn't able to fool your boss or the
concierge there.
jpnChrName: 所長さんとＳＣさんは 気づいていたみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
所長さんとＳＣさんは
気づいていたみたいだけど。

engChrName: I noticed you right away when I deployed those investigative shards.
engSearchText:
I noticed you right away when I deployed those
investigative shards.
jpnChrName: ええ、探査シャードの展開時に。
jpnSearchText: ええ、探査シャードの展開時に。

engChrName: Makes sense you'd be good at this kinda stealth mission, though.
engSearchText:
Makes sense you'd be good at this kinda stealth
mission, though.
jpnChrName: さすがこの手の潜入（スニーキング）は お手の物みたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
さすがこの手の潜入（スニーキング）は
お手の物みたいだな。

engChrName: Even if I did find you, I sure wasn't expectin' to. Didn't know everyone's favorite heroes of justice were into trespassin'.
engSearchText:
Even if I did find you, I sure wasn't expectin' to.
Didn't know everyone's favorite heroes of justice were
into trespassin'.
jpnChrName: だがいいのかよ、俺たちはまだしも “正義の味方”が不法侵入（こんなこと）をして。
jpnSearchText:
だがいいのかよ、俺たちはまだしも
“正義の味方”が不法侵入（こんなこと）をして。

engChrName: We're not when there's any other option. But in this case...there really wasn't one.
engSearchText:
We're not when there's any other option. But in this
case...there really wasn't one.
jpnChrName: 正攻法じゃ間に合わない── そう判断したまで。
jpnSearchText:
正攻法じゃ間に合わない──
そう判断したまで。

engChrName: We can't afford to drag our feet when civilian lives are in danger.
engSearchText:
We can't afford to drag our feet when civilian lives
are in danger.
jpnChrName: 民間人が拉致されているのに これ以上モタモタしてられない。
jpnSearchText:
民間人が拉致されているのに
これ以上モタモタしてられない。

engChrName: So to cut to the chase: mind if I tag along with you?
engSearchText: So to cut to the chase: mind if I tag along with you?
jpnChrName: 同行させてもらうけどいいよね？
jpnSearchText: 同行させてもらうけどいいよね？

engChrName: Not in the least. We could use your help, Sylphid.
engSearchText: Not in the least. We could use your help, Sylphid.
jpnChrName: むしろ願ったりだ。 よろしく頼むぜ──《妖精》。
jpnSearchText:
むしろ願ったりだ。
よろしく頼むぜ──《妖精》。

engChrName: Then we're good to go.
engSearchText: Then we're good to go.
jpnChrName: ん、こちらこそよろしく。
jpnSearchText: ん、こちらこそよろしく。

engChrName: Seriously...? Aww, screw it. We don't have time to waste right now.
engSearchText:
Seriously...? Aww, screw it. We don't have time to
waste right now.
jpnChrName: ったく……まあたしかに ウダウダやっている暇はねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……まあたしかに
ウダウダやっている暇はねぇか。

engChrName: Yes. We need to rescue Saara as soon as possible!
engSearchText: Yes. We need to rescue Saara as soon as possible!
jpnChrName: 今はとにかく サァラさん救出が最優先かと。
jpnSearchText:
今はとにかく
サァラさん救出が最優先かと。

engChrName: Right! Let's get on Gaspard's butt!
engSearchText: Right! Let's get on Gaspard's butt!
jpnChrName: ……はいっ。 ギャスパーの追跡を開始します！
jpnSearchText:
……はいっ。
ギャスパーの追跡を開始します！

engChrName: Fie has temporarily joined the party as a guest.
engSearchText: Fie has temporarily joined the party as a guest.
jpnChrName: フィーがゲストとして一時的に加入しました。
jpnSearchText: <C1>フィーがゲストとして一時的に加入しました。

engChrName: Heh. Not our first time seeing those lumps of metal.
engSearchText: Heh. Not our first time seeing those lumps of metal.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… 見覚えがあるデク共だな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
見覚えがあるデク共だな。

engChrName: Yeah. We fought things just like them in Langport.
engSearchText: Yeah. We fought things just like them in Langport.
jpnChrName: はい、ラングポートで 同じようなタイプと戦いました。
jpnSearchText:
はい、ラングポートで
同じようなタイプと戦いました。

engChrName: These aren't society-made... I'm guessing they're yours?
engSearchText:
These aren't society-made... I'm guessing
they're yours?
jpnChrName: 《結社》製じゃない…… そっちで造られたタイプかな？
jpnSearchText:
《結社》製じゃない……
そっちで造られたタイプかな？

engChrName: They are indeed security models from our lineup.
engSearchText: They are indeed security models from our lineup.
jpnChrName: ええ──弊社で提供している 警備マシナリィシリーズですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──弊社で提供している
警備マシナリィシリーズですね。

engChrName: Wait, what?!
engSearchText: Wait, what?!

engChrName: I-I knew your company sold weapons, but...
engSearchText: I-I knew your company sold weapons, but...
jpnChrName: へ、兵器を扱っているのは 知っていましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
へ、兵器を扱っているのは
知っていましたけど……

engChrName: We don't make the weapons ourselves, as that isn't our company's purview.
engSearchText:
We don't make the weapons ourselves, as that isn't
our company's purview.
jpnChrName: 技術メーカーではないため 製造はあくまで他社ですが……
jpnSearchText:
技術メーカーではないため
製造はあくまで他社ですが……

engChrName: Our role is to connect those seeking to purchase weapons with the relevant manufacturers.
engSearchText:
Our role is to connect those seeking to purchase
weapons with the relevant manufacturers.
jpnChrName: 求める側と提供する側を 仲介する立場にはなりますね。
jpnSearchText:
求める側と提供する側を
仲介する立場にはなりますね。

engChrName: What the hell...? You guys are deep in it, huh?
engSearchText: What the hell...? You guys are deep in it, huh?
jpnChrName: おいおい…… そういうレベルの話かよ。
jpnSearchText:
おいおい……
そういうレベルの話かよ。

engChrName: The society had a monopoly on that stuff in the underworld for a pretty long while.
engSearchText:
The society had a monopoly on that stuff in the
underworld for a pretty long while.
jpnChrName: ……従来、それ系は《結社》が 裏の市場を独占していたはずだった。
jpnSearchText:
……従来、それ系は《結社》が
裏の市場を独占していたはずだった。

engChrName: But recently, Marduk's been stealing a lot of their market share and expanding aboveboard AND under the table.
engSearchText:
But recently, Marduk's been stealing a lot of their
market share and expanding aboveboard AND under
the table.
jpnChrName: そのシェアを奪いつつ 表でも裏でも事業拡大している──
jpnSearchText:
そのシェアを奪いつつ
表でも裏でも事業拡大している──

engChrName: That's one reason the guild is so wary of you people.
engSearchText: That's one reason the guild is so wary of you people.
jpnChrName: ギルドが警戒する理由の一つかな。
jpnSearchText: ギルドが警戒する理由の一つかな。

engChrName: ...I can't say I blame you for that, either.
engSearchText: ...I can't say I blame you for that, either.
jpnChrName: ……はい。 無理からぬことかと。
jpnSearchText:
……はい。
無理からぬことかと。

engChrName: Still, whether a weapon's good or bad depends on who's using it.
engSearchText:
Still, whether a weapon's good or bad depends on
who's using it.
jpnChrName: ……ま、こういうモンは 使うヤツ次第ってのもあるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、こういうモンは
使うヤツ次第ってのもあるだろう。

engChrName: I take it you weren't aware these things were being used here?
engSearchText:
I take it you weren't aware these things were being
used here?
jpnChrName: それはともかく、ここでの運用は アンタも把握してなかったみたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
それはともかく、ここでの運用は
アンタも把握してなかったみたいだな？

engChrName: Correct. Vegas Films is not in our client database.
engSearchText: Correct. Vegas Films is not in our client database.
jpnChrName: はい──顧客データベースに ベガスフィルムの名前はありません。
jpnSearchText:
はい──顧客データベースに
ベガスフィルムの名前はありません。

engChrName: I suspect they were procured illicitly.
engSearchText: I suspect they were procured illicitly.
jpnChrName: おそらく別ルートから違法に 調達されたものが運用されているのかと。
jpnSearchText:
おそらく別ルートから違法に
調達されたものが運用されているのかと。

engChrName: The same is most likely true for the units you fought in Langport.
engSearchText:
The same is most likely true for the units you fought
in Langport.
jpnChrName: 皆様がラングポートで遭遇した個体も 同じかと思われます。
jpnSearchText:
皆様がラングポートで遭遇した個体も
同じかと思われます。

engChrName: They're all connected to Almata, then, huh?
engSearchText: They're all connected to Almata, then, huh?
jpnChrName: ハッ……どちらも アルマータ繋がりってことか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……どちらも
アルマータ繋がりってことか。

engChrName: So it seems—which makes their presence here further proof of Almata's involvement.
engSearchText:
So it seems—which makes their presence here further
proof of Almata's involvement.
jpnChrName: ええ、その意味では有力な 証拠と言えるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、その意味では有力な
証拠と言えるかもしれません。

engChrName: Yeah. Now let's get moving.
engSearchText: Yeah. Now let's get moving.
jpnChrName: ん……このまま進もう。
jpnSearchText: ん……このまま進もう。

engChrName: If we've found this much proof already, it's only going to keep coming.
engSearchText:
If we've found this much proof already, it's only going
to keep coming.
jpnChrName: 初っ端からこの調子なら、 叩けばいくらでも出てきそう。
jpnSearchText:
初っ端からこの調子なら、
叩けばいくらでも出てきそう。

engChrName: Wh-What is all this...?
engSearchText: Wh-What is all this...?
jpnChrName: こ、これは……
jpnSearchText: こ、これは……

engChrName: It's those plants we found in that cave...
engSearchText: It's those plants we found in that cave...
jpnChrName: 洞窟で見つけたあの植物……
jpnSearchText: 洞窟で見つけたあの植物……

engChrName: They must be what's fueling the hookahs.
engSearchText: They must be what's fueling the hookahs.
jpnChrName: それから精製されたシーシャ、 みたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
それから精製されたシーシャ、
みたいですね。

engChrName: And the fact they're here is pretty much the smoking gun for our theories.
engSearchText:
And the fact they're here is pretty much the smoking
gun for our theories.
jpnChrName: ここにあるってことは…… 大方の予想通りだったみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText:
ここにあるってことは……
大方の予想通りだったみてぇだな。

engChrName: What do you think these pills are?
engSearchText: What do you think these pills are?
jpnChrName: こっちの錠剤はなんだ？
jpnSearchText: こっちの錠剤はなんだ？

engChrName: Probably the enhancement drug they've been using.
engSearchText: Probably the enhancement drug they've been using.
jpnChrName: 多分、連中が使っていた── 能力増強タイプの薬物だろう。
jpnSearchText:
多分、連中が使っていた──
能力増強タイプの薬物だろう。

engChrName: What?! But then...
engSearchText: What?! But then...
jpnChrName: ！　それって……
jpnSearchText: ！　それって……

engChrName: This seems to suggest they're abusing it on a much broader scale.
engSearchText:
This seems to suggest they're abusing it on a much
broader scale.
jpnChrName: ……他にも色々な形で 悪用されていそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
……他にも色々な形で
悪用されていそうですね。

engChrName: Yeah. I had a feeling this operation was too big to be 'just' for messing with the film festival.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I had a feeling this operation was too big to be
'just' for messing with the film festival.
jpnChrName: 映画祭への仕込みだけにしては 規模が大きい気はしていた。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭への仕込みだけにしては
規模が大きい気はしていた。

engChrName: This facility must be for researching and manufacturing illegal drugs like these.
engSearchText:
This facility must be for researching and
manufacturing illegal drugs like these.
jpnChrName: そういった違法薬物を統合的に 研究・生産してた施設みたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
そういった違法薬物を統合的に
研究・生産してた施設みたいだね。

engChrName: Yeah. And it's probably one of many, too.
engSearchText: Yeah. And it's probably one of many, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、おそらく連中の 数ある施設の一つなんだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、おそらく連中の
数ある施設の一つなんだろうが。

engChrName: Regardless, this is concrete proof that Vegas Films is connected to the development of unlawful pharmaceuticals.
engSearchText:
Regardless, this is concrete proof that Vegas Films is
connected to the development of
unlawful pharmaceuticals.
jpnChrName: いずれにせよ、ベガスフィルムと 違法薬物を結びつける明確な証拠かと。
jpnSearchText:
いずれにせよ、ベガスフィルムと
違法薬物を結びつける明確な証拠かと。

engChrName: I will record our findings on my Xipha.
engSearchText: I will record our findings on my Xipha.
jpnChrName: ザイファで記録しておきます。
jpnSearchText: ザイファで記録しておきます。

engChrName: Thanks.
engSearchText: Thanks.
jpnChrName: ああ、頼んだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、頼んだ。

engChrName: Hang on—we're not supposed to be here. This isn't exactly admissible evidence.
engSearchText:
Hang on—we're not supposed to be here. This isn't
exactly admissible evidence.
jpnChrName: そういや、不法侵入で手に入れた 証拠ってのは効力あんのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
そういや、不法侵入で手に入れた
証拠ってのは効力あんのかよ？

engChrName: Well, it's a bit of a gray area, but there's ways of getting it to count.
engSearchText:
Well, it's a bit of a gray area, but there's ways of
getting it to count.
jpnChrName: んー……ちょい微妙（グレー）かな。 方法はいくつかあるけど。
jpnSearchText:
んー……ちょい微妙（グレー）かな。
方法はいくつかあるけど。

engChrName: Like sending the police in for something unrelated and having them find all this in the process.
engSearchText:
Like sending the police in for something unrelated
and having them find all this in the process.
jpnChrName: 別件で警察に踏み込ませて ついでに回収させてみるとか。
jpnSearchText:
別件で警察に踏み込ませて
ついでに回収させてみるとか。

engChrName: Bahaha! Money laundering, but for evidence, huh? Awesome.
engSearchText:
Bahaha! Money laundering, but for evidence, huh?
Awesome.
jpnChrName: クハハ、なるほど、 証拠品ロンダリングって事か。
jpnSearchText:
クハハ、なるほど、
証拠品ロンダリングって事か。

engChrName: Ooh! That's a great idea! I'll remember that one!
engSearchText: Ooh! That's a great idea! I'll remember that one!
jpnChrName: なるほど……勉強になりますっ。
jpnSearchText: なるほど……勉強になりますっ。

engChrName: I feel like some of us are taking the wrong lesson from all this...
engSearchText:
I feel like some of us are taking the wrong lesson from
all this...
jpnChrName: そ、それはあんまり 参考にしない方がいいんじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
そ、それはあんまり
参考にしない方がいいんじゃ……

engChrName: Hey! Look at all that!
engSearchText: Hey! Look at all that!
jpnChrName: ！　おい、見てみろ。
jpnSearchText: ！　おい、見てみろ。

engChrName: Whoa. They can't all be full of drugs, can they?
engSearchText: Whoa. They can't all be full of drugs, can they?
jpnChrName: これ、まさか…… 中身は全部薬物ですか？
jpnSearchText:
これ、まさか……
中身は全部薬物ですか？

engChrName: I'd put good mira on them being stuffed with exactly that. Guess this must be where the stuff's stored until it can be shipped out.
engSearchText:
I'd put good mira on them being stuffed with
exactly that. Guess this must be where the stuff's
stored until it can be shipped out.
jpnChrName: ああ……発送前の 商品置き場ってところか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……発送前の
商品置き場ってところか。

engChrName: There's so much of it...
engSearchText: There's so much of it...
jpnChrName: こんなに大量の違法薬物が……
jpnSearchText: こんなに大量の違法薬物が……

engChrName: You're looking at tens of millions of mira worth of product in this room alone.
engSearchText:
You're looking at tens of millions of mira worth of
product in this room alone.
jpnChrName: ……この部屋のものだけでも 数千万単位のミラが動きそうだね。
jpnSearchText:
……この部屋のものだけでも
数千万単位のミラが動きそうだね。

engChrName: I will inspect the terminal. There might be something of value on it.
engSearchText:
I will inspect the terminal. There might be something
of value on it.
jpnChrName: 端末を調べてみましょう、 データが残っているかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
端末を調べてみましょう、
データが残っているかもしれません。

engChrName: Looks like a list of the people buyin' this stuff.
engSearchText: Looks like a list of the people buyin' this stuff.
jpnChrName: こいつは…… 違法薬物の顧客リストか。
jpnSearchText:
こいつは……
違法薬物の顧客リストか。

engChrName: Indeed. Covering the past half year, it appears.
engSearchText: Indeed. Covering the past half year, it appears.
jpnChrName: はい、ここ半年のものですね。
jpnSearchText: はい、ここ半年のものですね。

engChrName: Most of it is encrypted, so it will take time to extract all of the details from it.
engSearchText:
Most of it is encrypted, so it will take time to extract
all of the details from it.
jpnChrName: 殆どが暗号化されているので すぐには特定できなさそうですが。
jpnSearchText:
殆どが暗号化されているので
すぐには特定できなさそうですが。

engChrName: Even so, it's clearly a long list. It seems this drug is rather more widely distributed than we thought...
engSearchText:
Even so, it's clearly a long list. It seems this drug is
rather more widely distributed than we thought...
jpnChrName: それでもこの数……思った以上に 表の世界にも浸透していそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
それでもこの数……思った以上に
表の世界にも浸透していそうですね。

engChrName: We could just sell this baby to Heiyue and have them take care of the dirty work for us.
engSearchText:
We could just sell this baby to Heiyue and have them
take care of the dirty work for us.
jpnChrName: クク、黒月あたりに売りつけりゃあ 勝手に何とかしてくれそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
クク、黒月あたりに売りつけりゃあ
勝手に何とかしてくれそうだが。

engChrName: Can't see us finding anything on Almata in here, though.
engSearchText:
Can't see us finding anything on Almata in
here, though.
jpnChrName: しかしアルマータに関する 情報は見当たらなさそうだな……
jpnSearchText:
しかしアルマータに関する
情報は見当たらなさそうだな……

engChrName: Yeah. They're not careless enough to leave names and whatnot in a database like this.
engSearchText:
Yeah. They're not careless enough to leave names and
whatnot in a database like this.
jpnChrName: ん、こういったデータベースに 残すようなヘマはしていない筈。
jpnSearchText:
ん、こういったデータベースに
残すようなヘマはしていない筈。

engChrName: But there has to be something on them on this floor.
engSearchText: But there has to be something on them on this floor.
jpnChrName: でも間違いなく何かあると思う。
jpnSearchText: でも間違いなく何かあると思う。

engChrName: The president wouldn't have snuck down here otherwise.
engSearchText:
The president wouldn't have snuck down
here otherwise.
jpnChrName: あの社長がコソコソ来た以上はな。
jpnSearchText: あの社長がコソコソ来た以上はな。

engChrName: Let's get back on his trail—we can't have far left to go now.
engSearchText:
Let's get back on his trail—we can't have far left to
go now.
jpnChrName: このまま追いかけるぞ。 大分進んだし最奥も近い筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
このまま追いかけるぞ。
大分進んだし最奥も近い筈だ。

engChrName: Right! Wherever he is, we're bound to find Saara, too!
engSearchText:
Right! Wherever he is, we're bound to find
Saara, too!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！ 恐らくサァラさんもそこに──！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ……！
恐らくサァラさんもそこに──！

engChrName: (...This has gotta be the place.)
engSearchText: (...This has gotta be the place.)
jpnChrName: （……ここだな。）
jpnSearchText: （……ここだな。）

engChrName: (We should be able to peek inside through this gap.)
engSearchText: (We should be able to peek inside through this gap.)
jpnChrName: （隙間から覗けそうです。）
jpnSearchText: （隙間から覗けそうです。）

engChrName: (There's Saara!)
engSearchText: (There's Saara!)
jpnChrName: （サァラさん……！）
jpnSearchText: （サァラさん……！）

engChrName: (That girl better not be—)
engSearchText: (That girl better not be—)
jpnChrName: （おい、まさか──）
jpnSearchText: （おい、まさか──）

engChrName: (She's okay. She's breathing.)
engSearchText: (She's okay. She's breathing.)
jpnChrName: （……大丈夫、呼吸してる。）
jpnSearchText: （……大丈夫、呼吸してる。）

engChrName: (I suspect she was administered a soporific of some sort.)
engSearchText:
(I suspect she was administered a soporific of
some sort.)
jpnChrName: （何らかの薬物で   眠らされているようですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（何らかの薬物で
眠らされているようですね。）

engChrName: E-Excellent! Once I dispose of this, I'm scot-free!
engSearchText: E-Excellent! Once I dispose of this, I'm scot-free!
jpnChrName: よ、よし……！ これさえ処分してしまえば……！
jpnSearchText:
よ、よし……！
これさえ処分してしまえば……！

engChrName: After that, I just need to dump the girl somewhere and leverage my political connections to—
engSearchText:
After that, I just need to dump the girl somewhere
and leverage my political connections to—
jpnChrName: あとは娘を適当に放り出して、 政界方面のコネでなんとか──
jpnSearchText:
あとは娘を適当に放り出して、
政界方面のコネでなんとか──

engChrName: It's too late to pretend none of this happened.
engSearchText: It's too late to pretend none of this happened.
jpnChrName: ──ううん、もう 無かったことにはできない。
jpnSearchText:
──ううん、もう
無かったことにはできない。

engChrName: Sorry for showin' up without an appointment, Mr. Dillon.
engSearchText:
Sorry for showin' up without an appointment,
Mr. Dillon.
jpnChrName: アポイントメントなしで 失礼するぜ、社長さんよ。
jpnSearchText:
アポイントメントなしで
失礼するぜ、社長さんよ。

engChrName: Kidnapping victim safely secured!
engSearchText: Kidnapping victim safely secured!
jpnChrName: 救出対象、確保完了！
jpnSearchText: 救出対象、確保完了！

engChrName: Are you all right, Saara?!
engSearchText: Are you all right, Saara?!
jpnChrName: 大丈夫ですか、サァラさん！
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫ですか、サァラさん！

engChrName: Ngh...
engSearchText: Ngh...
jpnSearchText: ……ぅ……………

engChrName: She is exhausted, but her vitals seem stable.
engSearchText: She is exhausted, but her vitals seem stable.
jpnChrName: 体力を消耗されていますが バイタルは安定していますね。
jpnSearchText:
体力を消耗されていますが
バイタルは安定していますね。

engChrName: Y-You're the handyman those actresses hired!
engSearchText: Y-You're the handyman those actresses hired!
jpnChrName: き、貴様らは…… 女優どもが雇った便利屋……！？
jpnSearchText:
き、貴様らは……
女優どもが雇った便利屋……！？

engChrName: How did you even get in here?! Th-This is trespassing, you know!
engSearchText:
How did you even get in here?! Th-This is
trespassing, you know!
jpnChrName: 一体どうやってここに── こ、これは不法侵入だぞ！？
jpnSearchText:
一体どうやってここに──
こ、これは不法侵入だぞ！？

engChrName: You're on our asses about 'trespassing'? We're here because of the shit you pulled, dumbass.
engSearchText:
You're on our asses about 'trespassing'? We're here
because of the shit you pulled, dumbass.
jpnChrName: アア、寝ぼけてんのか？ やらかしてんのはそっちだろ。
jpnSearchText:
アア、寝ぼけてんのか？
やらかしてんのはそっちだろ。

engChrName: Goes without sayin' that we'll be payin' you back on behalf of our client...
engSearchText:
Goes without sayin' that we'll be payin' you back on
behalf of our client...
jpnChrName: 依頼人が世話になった借りは キッチリ返させてもらうとして……
jpnSearchText:
依頼人が世話になった借りは
キッチリ返させてもらうとして……

engChrName: But you'll be handing over proof of your honeymoon with your 'friend,' too.
engSearchText:
But you'll be handing over proof of your honeymoon
with your 'friend,' too.
jpnChrName: “お友達”との 蜜月の証拠も渡してもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
“お友達”との
蜜月の証拠も渡してもらおうか？

engChrName: W-Wait! Please, let's just talk about this!
engSearchText: W-Wait! Please, let's just talk about this!
jpnChrName: っ……ま、待て、待ってくれ！ ミラならいくらでも出す！
jpnSearchText:
っ……ま、待て、待ってくれ！
ミラならいくらでも出す！

engChrName: I'm as much of a victim in this as anyone! They, they blackmailed me into doing their bidding!
engSearchText:
I'm as much of a victim in this as anyone! They, they
blackmailed me into doing their bidding!
jpnChrName: わ、私だって被害者なんだ！ マフィアに脅されて仕方なくっ……！
jpnSearchText:
わ、私だって被害者なんだ！
マフィアに脅されて仕方なくっ……！

engChrName: If you just take her and go without making a fuss, I'll happily give you...ten million mira! Yes! How does that sound?
engSearchText:
If you just take her and go without making a fuss, I'll
happily give you...ten million mira! Yes! How does
that sound?
jpnChrName: そのまま大事にせず娘を連れて帰れば 一千万までなら出してやれるぞ！？
jpnSearchText:
そのまま大事にせず娘を連れて帰れば
一千万までなら出してやれるぞ！？

engChrName: *whistle*
engSearchText: *whistle*
jpnChrName: ヒュウ……♪
jpnSearchText: ヒュウ……♪

engChrName: Even now, you're still trying to squirm your way out of this...
engSearchText:
Even now, you're still trying to squirm your way out
of this...
jpnChrName: この期に及んで……
jpnSearchText: この期に及んで……

engChrName: You don't know when to give up, do you?
engSearchText: You don't know when to give up, do you?
jpnChrName: 往生際、悪すぎですっ……！
jpnSearchText: 往生際、悪すぎですっ……！

engChrName: I might've given it some thought normally, but not while our guest's got her eye on us.
engSearchText:
I might've given it some thought normally, but not
while our guest's got her eye on us.
jpnChrName: 状況次第じゃ検討しなくもなかったが 生憎、ゲスト殿が一緒なんでな。
jpnSearchText:
状況次第じゃ検討しなくもなかったが
生憎、ゲスト殿が一緒なんでな。

engChrName: Ugh. Of course you would've.
engSearchText: Ugh. Of course you would've.
jpnChrName: 状況次第じゃいいんだ。
jpnSearchText: 状況次第じゃいいんだ。

engChrName: Still, you should really be sure who you're talking to before you start offering bribes.
engSearchText:
Still, you should really be sure who you're talking to
before you start offering bribes.
jpnChrName: ──まあ、取引相手は 選んだ方がいいのは確かかな。
jpnSearchText:
──まあ、取引相手は
選んだ方がいいのは確かかな。

engChrName: A BRACER?!
engSearchText: A BRACER?!
jpnChrName: 遊撃士ッ……！？
jpnSearchText: 遊撃士ッ……！？

engChrName: Th-This can't be happening...
engSearchText: Th-This can't be happening...
jpnChrName: ……バ、バカな………
jpnSearchText: ……バ、バカな………

engChrName: If you plan on pleading extenuating circumstances, though, we may be able to help.
engSearchText:
If you plan on pleading extenuating circumstances,
though, we may be able to help.
jpnChrName: 条件次第じゃ情状酌量には協力できる。
jpnSearchText: 条件次第じゃ情状酌量には協力できる。

engChrName: But only if you give us that file, the evidence that illegal drugs are being manufactured here, and the real goal of the festival.
engSearchText:
But only if you give us that file, the evidence that
illegal drugs are being manufactured here, and the
real goal of the festival.
jpnChrName: そのファイルは渡してもらうとして、 違法薬物製造の証拠に映画祭での真の狙い──
jpnSearchText:
そのファイルは渡してもらうとして、
違法薬物製造の証拠に映画祭での真の狙い──

engChrName: That, and provide testimony on all you know about Almata.
engSearchText:
That, and provide testimony on all you know
about Almata.
jpnChrName: アルマータ関連で知っていること、 全てを証言するなら。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータ関連で知っていること、
全てを証言するなら。

engChrName: Y-Y-Y-You can't be SERIOUS! Do you have any idea what'll happen to me if I rat them out?!
engSearchText:
Y-Y-Y-You can't be SERIOUS! Do you have any
idea what'll happen to me if I rat them out?!
jpnChrName: ば、馬鹿な…… そんなことをしたらどうなるか……！
jpnSearchText:
ば、馬鹿な……
そんなことをしたらどうなるか……！

engChrName: They show no mercy to traitors! You must know that!
engSearchText: They show no mercy to traitors! You must know that!
jpnChrName: 連中は裏切り者に容赦はしない…… お前たちだって分かっているだろう！？
jpnSearchText:
連中は裏切り者に容赦はしない……
お前たちだって分かっているだろう！？

engChrName: Please. I can't imagine you know anything that fatal to them.
engSearchText:
Please. I can't imagine you know anything that fatal
to them.
jpnChrName: ま、そこまで致命的な情報を 持っているとも思ってないけど。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そこまで致命的な情報を
持っているとも思ってないけど。

engChrName: But we can take you into witness protection after your arrest. We can even help you flee abroad if that's what you want.
engSearchText:
But we can take you into witness protection after
your arrest. We can even help you flee abroad if that's
what you want.
jpnChrName: 勿論、逮捕後の保護は取り計らう。 国外への避難もギルドなら可能だし。
jpnSearchText:
勿論、逮捕後の保護は取り計らう。
国外への避難もギルドなら可能だし。
ッ……

engChrName: I-I really don't know anything! All I did was give them a place to work!
engSearchText:
I-I really don't know anything! All I did was give
them a place to work!
jpnChrName: ほ、本当に何も知らないんだ……！ あくまで場所を提供していただけだ！
jpnSearchText:
ほ、本当に何も知らないんだ……！
あくまで場所を提供していただけだ！

engChrName: That goes for the orbal hookahs they made here, too! They just left us orders and ignored us afterwards!
engSearchText:
That goes for the orbal hookahs they made here, too!
They just left us orders and ignored us afterwards!
jpnChrName: ここで連中が製造していた導力シーシャも、 指示だけ残して後はナシのつぶてで……！
jpnSearchText:
ここで連中が製造していた導力シーシャも、
指示だけ残して後はナシのつぶてで……！

engChrName: I wouldn't be surprised if they'd left Tharbad in the dust by the time the police started their crackdown!
engSearchText:
I wouldn't be surprised if they'd left Tharbad in the
dust by the time the police started their crackdown!
jpnChrName: 警察が取り締まりを始めた時点で とっくに街から去った可能性もある！
jpnSearchText:
警察が取り締まりを始めた時点で
とっくに街から去った可能性もある！

engChrName: I don't even know why those thugs were so interested in Nina and the others to begin with...
engSearchText:
I don't even know why those thugs were so interested
in Nina and the others to begin with...
jpnChrName: そもそも、どうして連中が最初から 彼女たちに興味を示していたのかすら──
jpnSearchText:
そもそも、どうして連中が最初から
彼女たちに興味を示していたのかすら──

engChrName: The whole reason I sent that letter was to try and get them AWAY from danger!
engSearchText:
The whole reason I sent that letter was to try and get
them AWAY from danger!
jpnChrName: あの脅迫状だって、それから 何とか遠ざけてやりたかっただけで……！
jpnSearchText:
あの脅迫状だって、それから
何とか遠ざけてやりたかっただけで……！

engChrName: ...Hold on. What did you just say?
engSearchText: ...Hold on. What did you just say?
jpnChrName: ……？ 待て──いま何て言った？
jpnSearchText:
……？
待て──いま何て言った？

engChrName: Almata had an interest in Nina, Judith, Saara and the prince?
engSearchText:
Almata had an interest in Nina, Judith, Saara and
the prince?
jpnChrName: アルマータが、ニナさんにジュディスさん、 公太子殿下にサァラさんにも興味を……？
jpnSearchText:
アルマータが、ニナさんにジュディスさん、
公太子殿下にサァラさんにも興味を……？

jpnChrName: っ──しまった！
jpnSearchText: っ──<w800>しまった！

engChrName: From above?!
engSearchText: From above?!
jpnChrName: 天井から……！？
jpnSearchText: 天井から……！？

engChrName: Hey! Get back here!
engSearchText: Hey! Get back here!
jpnChrName: チッ──待てやコラ！！
jpnSearchText: チッ──待てやコラ！！

engChrName: Hahaha! Enjoy yourselves! I'll be exiting stage left!
engSearchText: Hahaha! Enjoy yourselves! I'll be exiting stage left!
jpnChrName: ハハハッ、せいぜい遊んでいたまえ！ 私はここで舞台から降りることにする！
jpnSearchText:
ハハハッ、せいぜい遊んでいたまえ！
私はここで舞台から降りることにする！

engChrName: I'm sure the prince can manage the festival, so you fools can do as you please!
engSearchText:
I'm sure the prince can manage the festival, so you
fools can do as you please!
jpnChrName: 映画祭も公太子が何とかするだろう！ あとは勝手にするといい！
jpnSearchText:
映画祭も公太子が何とかするだろう！
あとは勝手にするといい！

engChrName: You're not getting away!
engSearchText: You're not getting away!
jpnChrName: 逃がしませんっ。
jpnSearchText: 逃がしませんっ。

engChrName: Watch out!
engSearchText: Watch out!
jpnChrName: ──下がれ！
jpnSearchText: ──下がれ！

engChrName: A warrior model?! The society used to use ones like this!
engSearchText:
A warrior model?! The society used to use ones
like this!
jpnChrName: 武者型──！ 結社も運用していたけど……
jpnSearchText:
武者型──！
結社も運用していたけど……

engChrName: It's a close-combat prototype based on the models of which you speak.
engSearchText:
It's a close-combat prototype based on the models of
which you speak.
jpnChrName: ええ、それを参考に研究開発された 白兵用マシナリィの試作機です……！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、それを参考に研究開発された
白兵用マシナリィの試作機です……！

engChrName: It had reportedly been stolen after delivery to a client, but I didn't expect to find it here...
engSearchText:
It had reportedly been stolen after delivery to a client,
but I didn't expect to find it here...
jpnChrName: “某納入先”から盗まれたという 報告は受けておりましたが……！
jpnSearchText:
“某納入先”から盗まれたという
報告は受けておりましたが……！

engChrName: This came from you guys, too?! Hey, suggestion: stop making so much dangerous shit!
engSearchText:
This came from you guys, too?! Hey, suggestion: stop
making so much dangerous shit!
jpnChrName: コイツもかよ！？ ロクでもねぇモン作ってんじゃねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
コイツもかよ！？
ロクでもねぇモン作ってんじゃねぇ！

engChrName: I do apologize, but filing complaints will have to wait!
engSearchText: I do apologize, but filing complaints will have to wait!
jpnChrName: 恐れ入ります、 ですがクレームは後に……！
jpnSearchText:
恐れ入ります、
ですがクレームは後に……！

engChrName: Yeah! Let's take this thing down and get on his tail!
engSearchText: Yeah! Let's take this thing down and get on his tail!
jpnChrName: とっとと撃破して追いかける！ 行くぞ、お前ら──！
jpnSearchText:
とっとと撃破して追いかける！
行くぞ、お前ら──！

engChrName: Right! / Roger!
engSearchText: Right! / Roger!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！／了解（ウーラ）！！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！／了解（ウーラ）！！

engChrName: *pant* *pant* That should buy me enough time...
engSearchText: *pant* *pant* That should buy me enough time...
jpnChrName: ハアハアハア…… これだけ時間を稼げれば……！
jpnSearchText:
ハアハアハア……
これだけ時間を稼げれば……！

engChrName: I've had enough of dealing with criminals! I just want to get out of the country, and—
engSearchText:
I've had enough of dealing with criminals! I just want
to get out of the country, and—
jpnChrName: マフィアなんかもう沢山だ……！ このまま外国にでも高跳びして──
jpnSearchText:
マフィアなんかもう沢山だ……！
このまま外国にでも高跳びして──

engChrName: Criminals? Such a cruel label. Here I was thinking we were friends.
engSearchText:
Criminals? Such a cruel label. Here I was thinking we
were friends.
jpnChrName: ええ～、せっかく仲良くしてたのに そんな寂しいこと言っちゃうんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ええ～、せっかく仲良くしてたのに
そんな寂しいこと言っちゃうんだ？

engChrName: Y-You're...
engSearchText: Y-You're...
jpnChrName: あ、貴方は……
jpnSearchText: あ、貴方は……

engChrName: Just how could you be so cold, Gaspard Dillon? ❤
engSearchText: Just how could you be so cold, Gaspard Dillon? ❤
jpnChrName: つれないなぁ、 ギャスパー・ディロン社長❤
jpnSearchText:
つれないなぁ、
ギャスパー・ディロン社長❤

engChrName: What do you think?
engSearchText: What do you think?
jpnChrName: ねえ、そう思わない？
jpnSearchText: ねえ、そう思わない？

engChrName: He performed his role well. I will commend him for that.
engSearchText:
He performed his role well. I will commend him
for that.
jpnChrName: ──まあ、今まで よくやってくれた方だろう。
jpnSearchText:
──まあ、今まで
よくやってくれた方だろう。

engChrName: Rest assured, dear Dillon, that we will make this a festival to remember.
engSearchText:
Rest assured, dear Dillon, that we will make this a
festival to remember.
jpnChrName: ご苦労だった。 祭りはせいぜい盛り上げてやる。
jpnSearchText:
ご苦労だった。
祭りはせいぜい盛り上げてやる。

engChrName: It's time we served you as the opening act. Now...let us see your fear.
engSearchText:
It's time we served you as the opening act. Now...let
us see your fear.
jpnChrName: ただし前座は務めてもらうぞ── お前自身の“恐怖”でな。
jpnSearchText:
ただし前座は務めてもらうぞ──
お前自身の“恐怖”でな。

engChrName: No... Nonononooo!
engSearchText: No... Nonononooo!
jpnChrName: あ、ああ……あああああああ……！！
jpnSearchText: あ、ああ……あああああああ……！！

engChrName: Whew... We did it.
engSearchText: Whew... We did it.
jpnChrName: はあはあ、 やりましたっ……！
jpnSearchText:
はあはあ、
やりましたっ……！

engChrName: Yup. That takes care of that.
engSearchText: Yup. That takes care of that.
jpnChrName: ん、撃破完了だね。
jpnSearchText: ん、撃破完了だね。

engChrName: We defeated it two minutes faster than I anticipated. Well done, everyone.
engSearchText:
We defeated it two minutes faster than I anticipated.
Well done, everyone.
jpnChrName: お疲れさまでした── 想定より２分早かったかと。
jpnSearchText:
お疲れさまでした──
想定より２分早かったかと。

engChrName: Would you cool it with the pre-battle combat analysis?!
engSearchText:
Would you cool it with the pre-battle
combat analysis?!
jpnChrName: って冷静に事前の 戦力分析してんじゃねえ……！
jpnSearchText:
って冷静に事前の
戦力分析してんじゃねえ……！

engChrName: Where...am I...?
engSearchText: Where...am I...?
jpnSearchText: ………ここ、は………

engChrName: What happened to the parade? Where's Shaheena?
engSearchText: What happened to the parade? Where's Shaheena?
jpnChrName: ……パレード……シャヒーナは………
jpnSearchText: ……パレード……シャヒーナは………

engChrName: Saara!
engSearchText: Saara!
jpnChrName: サァラさん……！
jpnSearchText: サァラさん……！

engChrName: Glad you're up. Now we've just gotta go after—
engSearchText: Glad you're up. Now we've just gotta go after—
jpnChrName: ふう、目を覚ましたか。 あとはあのオッサンを──
jpnSearchText:
ふう、目を覚ましたか。
あとはあのオッサンを──

engChrName: GRAAAAAAAAAGH!
engSearchText: GRAAAAAAAAAGH!
jpnChrName: ぎゃあああああああっ……！！
jpnSearchText: ぎゃあああああああっ……！！

engChrName: Was that—?
engSearchText: Was that—?
jpnChrName: おい、今のは……！
jpnSearchText: おい、今のは……！

engChrName: Stay here with Saara!
engSearchText: Stay here with Saara!
jpnChrName: ここは頼む！
jpnSearchText: ここは頼む！

engChrName: R-Right!
engSearchText: R-Right!
jpnChrName: は、はい……！
jpnSearchText: は、はい……！

engChrName: Damn it all...
engSearchText: Damn it all...

engChrName: We were too late.
engSearchText: We were too late.
jpnChrName: ……遅かったか。
jpnSearchText: ……遅かったか。

engChrName: Look forward to the film festival  \\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000❤ Melchior
engSearchText:
Look forward to the film festival
\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000❤ Melchior
jpnChrName: 映画祭、楽しみにしてるよ❤   　　　　　　　──メルキオル
jpnSearchText:
映画祭、楽しみにしてるよ❤
　　　　　　　──メルキオル
